verses.name: Deuteronomy 18:10
verses.text: There shall not be found among you any one that maketh his son or his daughter to pass through the fire, or that useth divination, or an observer of times, or an enchanter, or a witch,

verses.name: Deuteronomy 18:11
verses.text: Or a charmer, or a consulter with familiar spirits, or a wizard, or a necromancer.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 18:12
verses.text: For all that do these things are an abomination unto the Lord: and because of these abominations the Lord thy God doth drive them out from before thee.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 18:13
verses.text: Thou shalt be perfect with the Lord thy God.
